name: Dance Dance EXECUTION
description:
Dance Dance EXECUTION is a rhythm game made by Marcsine, Reign, Osman, and Qthesurv for the Miziziziz Game Jam 1. 

DANCE OFF against other creatures, monsters, and bosses until you destroy their ego and tarnish their reputation.

VIBE to the engrossing original soundtrack by Marcsine as you dance against other enemies.
